details.fbk: You can use your FBK digital badge to enter different office locations, and access enterprise mobile and web-based services.

activationBanner.title: Your digital documents always with you!
activationBanner.description: Activate the Wallet to keep your digital identity and personal documents on your device.

walletInstanceCreation.title: Your digital documents at your fingertips
walletInstanceCreation.description:
###### How it works 
 Wallet allows you to save and keep on your device the digital version of your Identity and some of the physical documents you already own.  

 ###### It's easy and fast 
 You can authenticate yourself in Italy and abroad for many digital services, or verify your credentials in person by showing the QR code linked to the digital versions of your documents.

preview.title: Digital Idenitity:
preview.subtitle: Here's a preview of your data

success.title: It's all ready!
success.subtitle: You can now add your documents and access online services.

failure.title: An unexpected error occurred
failure.subtitle: Your request to the issuing entity was not successful.

credentialNotFound.title: Aggiungi il documento al Portafoglio
credentialNotFound.subtitle: Per usare i documenti su IO, prima aggiungili al Portafoglio. Ãˆ facile e veloce.

dialog.title: Do you want to remove the document from the wallet?
dialog.content: If you change your mind, you can add it again later.

loading.title: We are doing some security checks
loading.subtitle: Wait few seconds

trust.title: Allow your data to be read
trust.subtitle: They will be shared to access to services.

disclaimer.0: Your data is safe and will be processed only for the purposes described in the Privacy Policy.
disclaimer.1: The data will be shared only for the time necessary to issue the credential.

successWithRedirect.title: Done!
successWithRedirect.subtitle: You will be redirected to the partner site

showQr.title: Show QR
showQr.body: Display the QR code to verify the validity of the documents in your Wallet.

connected.body: Verification in progress. Please wait a few seconds...

disconnected.title: Disconnection
disconnected.body: The device has been disconnected. Please check the verifier app for more details.

success.title: Done!
success.subtitle: The verification has been successfully completed.

failure.title: An error has occurred
failure.subtitle: Your data has been sent, but there has been an error. Check the verifier app for more information.
failure.subtitleFatal: We were unable to complete the verification of your document.

disclaimer.store: Your data is secure and will only be processed for the purposes described in the Privacy Notice.
disclaimer.retention: The data will only be shared for the time necessary to issue the digital version of the document.
